Class_Quest_Name_In the Image of the Anc: In the Image of the Ancients
Class_Skill_Desc_Adloquium: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 300</br>Additional Effect: Grants Galvanize to target, nullifying damage equaling 180% of the amount of HP restored. When critical HP is restored, also grants Catalyze, nullifying damage equaling 180% the amount of HP restored.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with certain sage barrier effects.
Class_Skill_Desc_Aetherflow: Restores 20% of maximum MP.</br>Additional Effect: Aetherflow III</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Aetherpact: Orders faerie to execute Fey Union with target party member. Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Faerie Gauge Cost: 10</br>Fey Union Effect: Gradually restores HP of party member with which faerie has a Fey Union.</br>Cure Potency: 300</br>Faerie Gauge is depleted by 10 periodically while HP is restored. Fey Union effect fades upon execution of other faerie actions or when party member moves from within 30 yalms of the faerie.</br>The Faerie Gauge increases when a faerie or Seraph/a faerie is summoned and an Aetherflow action is successfully executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Angel's Whisper: Gradually restores the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 80</br>Duration: 21s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Art of War: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 165 to all nearby enemies.
Class_Skill_Desc_Art of War II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 180 to all nearby enemies.
Class_Skill_Desc_Breath of the Earth: Restores 60% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Broil: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 220.
Class_Skill_Desc_Broil II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 240.
Class_Skill_Desc_Broil III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 255.
Class_Skill_Desc_Broil IV: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 295.
Class_Skill_Desc_Chain Stratagem: Increases rate at which target takes critical hits by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Consolation: Restores the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deployment Tactics: Extends Galvanize effect cast on self or target party member to other nearby party members.</br>Duration: Time remaining on original effect</br>No effect when target is not under the effect of Galvanize.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dissipation: Orders your faerie away while granting you a full Aetherflow stack. Also increases healing magic potency by 20%.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Current faerie will return once the effect expires.</br>Summon Eos cannot be executed while under the effect of Dissipation.</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Embrace: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 180</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Emergency Tactics: Transforms the next Galvanize and Catalyze statuses into HP recovery equaling the amount of damage reduction intended for the barrier.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Energy Drain: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Absorbs a portion of damage dealt as HP</br>Additional Effect: Increases Faerie Gauge by 10</br>//Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Excogitation: Grants self or target party member the effect of Excogitation, restoring HP when member's HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration.</br>Cure Potency: 800</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: Increases Faerie Gauge by 10</br>//Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Expedient: Grants Expedience and Desperate Measures to all nearby party members.</br>Expedience Effect: Increases movement speed</br>Duration: 10s</br>Desperate Measures Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Fey Blessing: Restores the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 320</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fey Illumination: Increases healing magic potency of all nearby party members by 10%, while reducing magic damage taken by all nearby party members by 5%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Seraphic Illumination.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fey Union: Gradually restores HP of party member with which faerie has a Fey Union.</br>Cure Potency: 300</br>Faerie Gauge is depleted by 10 periodically while HP is restored. Fey Union effect fades upon execution of other faerie actions or when party member moves from within 30 yalms of the faerie.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Healing Wind: Restores 25% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Indomitability: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Additional Effect: Increases Faerie Gauge by 10</br>//Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Lustrate: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 600</br>Additional Effect: Increases Faerie Gauge by 10</br>//Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Adloquium: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Additional Effect: Grants Galvanize and Catalyze to target</br>Galvanize Effect: Absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 15s</br>Barrier potency is increased by 50% when you are under the effect of Recitation.</br>Catalyze Effect: Increases damage dealt by 8%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Biolysis: Afflicts target with Biolysis and Biolytic.</br>Biolysis Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 15s</br>Potency is increased by 50% when you are under the effect of Recitation.</br>Biolytic Effect: Reduces target's damage dealt by 8%</br>Duration: 15s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Broil IV: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 5,000.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Consolation: Restores the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 4,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Deployment Tactics: Extends Galvanize and Catalyze effects cast on self or target to nearby party members.</br>When targeting an enemy, extends Biolysis and Biolytic effects to other nearby enemies.</br>Duration: Time remaining on original effect</br>No effect on targets not under effects applied by you, players riding machina, or non-player combatants.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Expedient: Grants Expedience and Desperate Measures to self and all nearby party members.</br>Expedience Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Desperate Measures Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Recitation</br>Recitation Effect: Increases the potency of Galvanize, Biolysis, and Biolytic effects</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Mummification: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's HP recovered by healing actions by 25%</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Seraph Flight: Grants Seraph Flight and Excogitation to all nearby party members.</br>Seraph Flight Effect: Nullifies the next status affliction that can be removed by Purify</br>Duration: 20s</br>Excogitation Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Duration: 20s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Seraphic Veil: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 4,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Summon Seraph: Summons Seraph to fight at a designated location.</br>Seraph will execute Seraph Flight immediately after being summoned.</br>Automatically casts Seraphic Veil on party members who suffer damage.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Recitation</br>Recitation Effect: Increases the potency of Galvanize, Biolysis, and Biolytic effects</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 90s</br>※Action changes to Consolation upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Protraction: Increases maximum HP of a party member or self by 10% and restores the amount increased.</br>Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10%</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Recitation: Allows the execution of Adloquium, Succor, Indomitability, or Excogitation without consuming resources while also ensuring critical HP is restored.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Repose: Afflicts target with Sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rescue: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resurrection: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ruin: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ruin II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 220.
Class_Skill_Desc_Sacred Soil: Creates a designated area in which party members will only suffer 90% of all damage inflicted.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>//Additional Effect: Increases Faerie Gauge by 10</br>//Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Seraphic Illumination: Increases healing magic potency of nearby party members by 10%, while reducing magic damage taken by nearby party members by 5%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Fey Illumination.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Seraphic Veil: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 180</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Succor: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 160% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with certain sage barrier effects.
Class_Skill_Desc_Summon Eos: Summons the faerie Eos to fight at your side. When set to guard, automatically casts Embrace on party members who suffer damage.
Class_Skill_Desc_Summon Seraph: Summons Seraph to fight at your side. When set to guard, automatically casts Seraphic Veil on party members who suffer damage.</br>Cannot summon Seraph unless a pet is already summoned. Current pet will leave the battlefield while Seraph is present, and return once gone.</br>Duration: 22s</br>※Action changes to Consolation upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Whispering Dawn: Gradually restores the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 80</br>Duration: 21s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Status_Desc_Consolation: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Dissipation: Damage dealt and potency of all HP restoration actions are increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Excogitation: HP will be restored automatically upon falling below a certain level or expiration of effect duration.
Class_Status_Desc_Mummification: HP recovery via healing actions is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Protraction: Maximum HP is increased and HP recovery via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Recitation: Adloquium and Biolysis effects are enhanced.
Class_Status_Desc_Seraph Flight: Nullifying status afflictions that can be removed by Purify.
Class_Status_Desc_Seraphic Veil: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Summon Seraph: Manifesting Seraph to assist in battle.
Class_Trait_Desc_Art of War Mastery: Upgrades Art of War to Art of War II.
Class_Trait_Desc_Broil Mastery: Upgrades Ruin to Broil and increases the potency of Ruin II to 160, and Art of War to 165.
Class_Trait_Desc_Broil Mastery II: Upgrades Broil to Broil II and increases the potency of Ruin II to 180.
Class_Trait_Desc_Broil Mastery III: Upgrades Broil II to Broil III and increases the potency of Ruin II to 200.
Class_Trait_Desc_Broil Mastery IV: Upgrades Broil III to Broil IV and increases the potency of Ruin II to 220.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Aethercharge: Grants Ruby Arcanum and Topaz Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Aethercharge I: Grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Deployment Tac: Reduces Deployment Tactics recast time to 90 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Healing Magic: Increases the healing potency of Physick to 450, Embrace to 180, and Seraphic Veil to 180.</br>Increases the barrier potency of Adloquium to 180% the amount healed and Succor to 160% the amount healed.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Sacred Soil: Adds an additional effect to Sacred Soil that grants healing over time.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%. Also increases base damage and HP restoration of your pet by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%. Also increases base damage and HP restoration of your pet by 30%.
